content: Utilize crypto surge and earn profit with crypto arbitrage bot trading!Crypto arbitrage bot will trade for you 24/7. Our bot is developed with premium features to ensure profit. Sit back and relax while our bot trade for you.Available at affordable cost. Deployment in 7days. 200+ clients over 8 countries.Beleaf technologies is top tier and recogonized crypto arbitrage bot development company in google.Get demo - https://www.beleaftechnologies.com/crypto-arbitrage-trading-bot

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Parkerbeleaf on October 28, 2023, 08:49:04 AMCrypto arbitrage bot will trade for you 24/7. Our bot is developed with premium features to ensure 100% profit. Sit back and relax while our bot trade for you.If profit is guaranteed, why do you need to sell the service? Use this bot and get free profits.It is true that a crypto arbitrage bot can achieve profits, but it needs to be fast and to have a strategy. Even so, profit is not guaranteed and therefore there is no such thing as 100% profit.This is the first time I hear about Beleaf Technologies. Are there any details about the nature of their work?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on October 28, 2023, 11:14:01 AMIf profit is guaranteed, why do you need to sell the service? Use this bot and get free profits.OP is more like those so-called influencers who will shill you into Financial wellness books written by them. They will tell you how you will get rich by reading their books but for some reason, the same authors can't get rich using the very knowledge they are trying to sell off. The only way they obtain money is from the gullible users who buy their books. The same principle applies to these users who sell “trading signals”, “Excellent Trading bots” etc.Judging from his posting history, there is no tradingbot OP is selling. Just looking for a way of scamming.

comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 30, 2023, 11:21:25 PMJudging from his posting history, there is no tradingbot OP is selling. Just looking for a way of scamming.I see these people on YouTube, but they spend a lot to tell you that they are rich, either by renting cars, luxurious rooms, and trying to prove it on Instagram, or through open seminars attended by thousands.@op He didn't put much effort into convincing people that he had something special worth spending money on.anyway, I may give him natural trust.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on October 28, 2023, 11:14:01 AMQuote from: Parkerbeleaf on October 28, 2023, 08:49:04 AMCrypto arbitrage bot will trade for you 24/7. Our bot is developed with premium features to ensure 100% profit. Sit back and relax while our bot trade for you.If profit is guaranteed, why do you need to sell the service? Use this bot and get free profits.It is true that a crypto arbitrage bot can achieve profits, but it needs to be fast and to have a strategy. Even so, profit is not guaranteed and therefore there is no such thing as 100% profit.This is the first time I hear about Beleaf Technologies. Are there any details about the nature of their work?just from the words "100% profit guarantee" i already knew that this was a scam project. because if we use logic with 100% guaranteed profits, why not use it yourself and enjoy all the profits, why bother selling the service to other people? that alone can prove that this is a scam project. and there is no history of a trading bot being able to provide 100% profit because that is impossible to achieve.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: Parkerbeleaf on October 28, 2023, 08:49:04 AMUtilize crypto surge and earn profit with crypto arbitrage bot trading!Crypto arbitrage bot will trade for you 24/7. Our bot is developed with premium features to ensure 100% profit. Sit back and relax while our bot trade for you.Available at affordable cost. Deployment in 7days. 200+ clients over 8 countries.Beleaf technologies is top tier and recogonized crypto arbitrage bot development company in google.Get demo - https://www.beleaftechnologies.com/crypto-arbitrage-trading-botSince I got the idea of a bot, I knew that it has been misused for quite a number of times. According to the Op, the bit has premium features that will ensure 100% profits. All you need to do is to sit back, relax and enjoy. This is never the idea behind bots. Because we used them the wrong way, that is why it is not always profitable on the long run.I think not should be developed strategy written on codes that execute when they are prompted. Some certain conditions need to be met before the bot brings profits. I therefore believe that bots should come in brief of humans for sometimes and not always. And the person who controls the bot must have good idea of the market in order to make better manipulations with the bot, else, losses are inevitable.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: There is no type of trading with a 100% guaranteed profit. This is far from reality and just propaganda with no proof. I have tried many trading robots and only a few times have the results been satisfactory.As for arbitrage robots, it is true that they are profitable sometimes, but they contain many problems, because they require speed and having accounts in all the exchanges that have price differences. In addition, these exchanges close withdrawals and deposits as soon as these price differences are discovered.

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on October 28, 2023, 11:14:01 AMIf profit is guaranteed, why do you need to sell the service? Use this bot and get free profits.It is true that a crypto arbitrage bot can achieve profits, but it needs to be fast and to have a strategy. Even so, profit is not guaranteed and therefore there is no such thing as 100% profit.This is the first time I hear about Beleaf Technologies. Are there any details about the nature of their work?Now, if OP were to release it to the public for free for a free trial, it would be a different story because once it proves itself to be a bot that can generate you a profit then it's a different story because there's proof already so then we won't mind paying for the bot but that's only possible if OP releases the bot for free but right now, it's as you're saying, it's too good to be true so it's not worth being excited about it.Quote from: yhiaali3 on November 09, 2023, 04:53:39 AMThere is no type of trading with a 100% guaranteed profit. This is far from reality and just propaganda with no proof. I have tried many trading robots and only a few times have the results been satisfactory.As for arbitrage robots, it is true that they are profitable sometimes, but they contain many problems, because they require speed and having accounts in all the exchanges that have price differences. In addition, these exchanges close withdrawals and deposits as soon as these price differences are discovered.It's kind of contradictory of you to say that bots don't work and then at the next paragraph, you're saying that arbitrage bots are profitable although I won't dispute that trading isn't a guaranteed profit since that's true and obvious unless you are a God. Maybe your concern can be something that can be easily solved I mean that multiple exchanges then probably a programming voodoo could be useful to create that and there's a lot of IT industry people that can do exactly what you're describing, it's probably a matter of how you plan to your steps into building that arbitrage bot.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: Latviand on November 10, 2023, 03:22:39 PMIt's kind of contradictory of you to say that bots don't work and then at the next paragraph, you're saying that arbitrage bots are profitable although I won't dispute that trading isn't a guaranteed profit since that's true and obvious unless you are a God.What contradiction? Read the post carefully. I did not say that robots do not work. I said:Quote from: yhiaali3 on November 09, 2023, 04:53:39 AMThere is no type of trading with a 100% guaranteed profit. TFirst, I said about trading that there is no 100% guaranteed profit, and I did not say that robots do not work.Quote from: yhiaali3 on November 09, 2023, 04:53:39 AMAs for arbitrage robots, it is true that they are profitable sometimes, but they contain many problems, Secondly, I said about arbitrage robots that they work only a few times, not that they do not work at all. Robots depend primarily on the trader, who must have sufficient experience to program the robot.Please read the words carefully.

If this were true, they would become rich in a short time. However, it seems that this scam succeeds.I see that @OP is online and yet he doesn't seem to want to respond to them. These are all negative indicators that they are scammers, and I might put a negative trust on them if I hear complaints from others.
